name: no rank
description: Taxonomic level without a specified rank

name: species
description: A species is a group of individuals able to interbreed

name: no rank - terminal
description: Lowest level in classification with no further subdivisions

name: genus
description: Rank above species, grouping closely related species

name: subspecies
description: A taxonomic rank below species, representing populations with distinct characteristics

name: species group
description: A grouping of related species within a genus

name: species subgroup
description: A subgroup within a species group, indicating closer relationships

name: family
description: A higher taxonomic rank grouping together related genera

name: subfamily
description: A rank below family, grouping related genera within a family

name: tribe
description: A rank between family and genus, used in some classifications

name: class
description: A rank below phylum, grouping related orders

name: order
description: A rank below class, grouping related families

name: phylum
description: A rank below kingdom, grouping related classes

name: subgenus
description: A taxonomic rank below genus, grouping species within a genus

name: forma
description: A rank below species, representing minor morphological differences

name: varietas
description: A rank below species, indicating a botanical variety

name: superfamily
description: A rank above family, grouping related families

name: subtribe
description: A rank below tribe, grouping related genera within a tribe

name: subsection
description: A rank below section, grouping related species within a section

name: infraclass
description: A rank below class, grouping related orders within a class

name: suborder
description: A rank below order, grouping related families within an order

name: subclass
description: A rank below class, grouping related orders within a class

name: superorder
description: A rank above order, grouping related orders

name: infraorder
description: A rank below order, grouping related families within an order

name: subphylum
description: A rank below phylum, grouping related classes within a phylum

name: superclass
description: A rank above class, grouping related classes

name: parvorder
description: A rank below infraorder, grouping related families within an infraorder

name: subcohort
description: A rank below cohort, grouping related orders within a cohort

name: section
description: A rank below genus, grouping related species

name: infrakingdom
description: A rank below kingdom, grouping related phyla within a kingdom

name: variety
description: A rank below species, indicating a botanical variety

name: subkingdom
description: A rank below kingdom, grouping related phyla

name: domain
description: The highest taxonomic rank, grouping related kingdoms

name: kingdom
description: A high taxonomic rank grouping related phyla

name: infraphylum
description: A rank below subphylum, grouping related classes within a subphylum

name: supertribe
description: A rank above tribe, grouping related tribes

name: infraspecificname
description: A name for a taxonomic rank below species, such as subspecies or variety

name: subterclass
description: A rank below subclass, grouping related orders

name: subdivision
description: A rank below division, used primarily in botany

name: cohort
description: A rank below class, grouping related orders

name: superphylum
description: A rank above phylum, grouping related phyla
